definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Textbooks commonly denote shear stresses by the symbol and two subscripts.
sentences.chinese: 教科書通常用符號和兩個腳標表示剪應力。

sentences.english: The height of the sh, ear fine has little influence on the shear stress.
sentences.chinese: 剪片高度對側面剪應力幾乎沒有影響。

sentences.english: Earthquake is the rupture prdess of rock In large scale under the applied shear stress.
sentences.chinese: 地震是在剪應力作用下發生的岩石大規模破裂過程。

sentences.english: Draw the element for maximum shear stress and mark values of all stresses.
sentences.chinese: 畫出最大剪應力的單元體並標出全部應力值。

sentences.english: Firstly, the maximum shearing stress envelope line was put forward to replace section line.
sentences.chinese: 首先提出採用最大剪應力包絡線來代替剖面線。
